participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: i'm a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.background: i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i've been traveling the world for a years. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go.
